response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would perfectly meet your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and value, I understand its worth to you stands at $8,000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $7,200. This exclusive offer is designed to ensure you benefit from a significant savings while securing an item that holds great significance for you. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to facilitate this transaction.", "product_price": 7200}
